definition: root/basis/classifier for long slender objects, e.g. cigarettes, guitar strings/CL:條|条[tiao2]/radical (chemistry)
root/stem/origin/source/this/the current/original/inherent/originally/classifier for books, periodicals, files etc
France/French/abbr. for 法國|法国[Fa3 guo2]/Taiwan pr. [Fa4]
law/method/way/to emulate/(Buddhism) dharma/(abbr. for 法家[Fa3 jia1]) the Legalists/(physics) farad (abbr. for 法拉[fa3 la1])

sentences.english: Constitution is the national fundamental law, with supreme status.
sentences.chinese: 宪法是国家的根本法，具有至高无上的地位。

sentences.english: The constitution is the fundamental law of the State, and has supreme legal force.
sentences.chinese: 宪法是国家的根本法，具有最高的法律效力。

sentences.english: The Constitution is the fundamental law of the state.
Constitution often means the fundamental law or the supreme law of the country.
sentences.chinese: 宪法通常指的是国家的根本法或者最高法律。

sentences.english: Constitution is the basic law of a country.
sentences.chinese: 宪法是在一国法律体系中的根本法。

definition: to rule according to the law
system of constitutional government/(used as an attributive) constitutional
common program/formal program of the communist party after 1949, that served as interim national plan
